epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication and multi-factor authentication.
epics.description: Develop a secure user authentication process that includes multi-factor authentication to ensure only authorized users can access the portal. Security features should comply with industry standards and best practices to protect users' sensitive financial data.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard for users.
epics.description: Design and develop a personalized dashboard that displays banking products and services based on the user's profile and eligibility. The dashboard should provide an intuitive and user-friendly interface that allows users to navigate and access information easily.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Ensure the portal is responsive and works across various devices.
epics.description: Implement a responsive design for the self-service portal to ensure it provides a consistent user experience across all devices, including desktops, tablets, and mobile phones. The portal should adapt to different screen sizes and resolutions seamlessly.

epics.title: Integrate with Core Banking System
epics.summary: Seamlessly integrate the portal with the bank's existing core banking system.
epics.description: Establish a robust integration with the bank's core banking system to ensure data consistency, real-time updates, and efficient processing. The integration should be designed to optimize performance and maintain the reliability of both systems.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Implement workflows for account opening and service modifications.
epics.description: Develop streamlined workflows that allow users to submit account opening requests and service modifications with minimal clicks. These workflows should be intuitive and require the least amount of effort from the user while ensuring all necessary information is captured efficiently.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Updates and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time status updates and email notifications for submitted requests.
epics.description: Implement a system for real-time status tracking of submitted requests. Users should receive email notifications on the status of their requests, ensuring they are always informed about the progress and any required actions.

epics.title: Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive history of user interactions.
epics.description: Create a feature that logs and displays a comprehensive history of all user interactions within the portal. Users should be able to view past actions, submissions, and modifications, providing transparency and a record of their activities.

epics.title: Save and Resume Incomplete Applications
epics.summary: Allow users to save and resume incomplete applications.
epics.description: Develop the functionality that allows users to save their progress on incomplete applications and return to them at a later time. This feature should ensure that users can upload necessary documentation directly through the interface and continue from where they left off.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement role-based access controls based on user profiles.
epics.description: Establish role-based access controls to ensure that users can only view and access the services and information that are appropriate for their profile and authorization level. This will enhance security and personalization of the portal.

epics.title: Database Optimization for Performance
epics.summary: Optimize the portal's database for performance and reliability.
epics.description: Ensure optimal performance and high reliability of the self-service portal by maintaining its own database while seamlessly integrating with the bank's core banking system. Implement database optimization techniques such as indexing, caching, and load balancing to handle high volumes of user interactions efficiently.

epics.title: Documentation Upload Feature
epics.summary: Enable users to upload necessary documentation through the interface.
epics.description: Develop a functionality that allows users to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface while submitting account opening requests or service modifications. This feature should support various file formats and ensure secure storage of uploaded documents.

user_stories.title: Implement secure user authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to authenticate securely, so that my sensitive financial data is protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Authentication must support industry standards and best practices for security.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. User can securely login using username and password.
2. Authentication mechanism complies with security standards.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I am on the login page, when I enter my username and password, then I should be logged in securely.

user_stories.title: Implement multi-factor authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to set up and use multi-factor authentication, so that my account is more secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The system should support multiple methods for multi-factor authentication.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. User can set up multi-factor authentication.
2. User must use multi-factor authentication to access the account.
user_stories.test_cases: Given I have multi-factor authentication set up, when I login, then I should be prompted for an additional verification step.

user_stories.title: Compliance with security standards
user_stories.description: As a security officer, I want the authentication process to comply with industry standards, so that we maintain high security levels.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: All authentication mechanisms should be compliant with applicable security standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Authentication mechanisms are reviewed and comply with industry standards.
2. Regular audits are performed to ensure compliance.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the security standards, when the authentication mechanisms are reviewed, then they should be compliant with those standards.

user_stories.title: Design personalized dashboard interface
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can easily access banking products and services relevant to me.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard interface should be intuitive and user-friendly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can see personalized content based on their profile.
2. Dashboard interface is intuitive.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user's profile, when they access the dashboard, then they should see personalized content relevant to them.

user_stories.title: Show products based on user eligibility
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the dashboard to show products I am eligible for, so that I can find relevant banking services quickly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Only products and services the user is eligible for should be displayed.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Dashboard displays products and services based on user eligibility.
2. Users are able to see available options clearly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user's eligibility, when they view the dashboard, then it should display products and services they are eligible for.

user_stories.title: Ensure easy navigation on the dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to navigate the dashboard easily, so that I can find and use banking services without difficulty.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Navigation should be intuitive and user-friendly.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can navigate through the dashboard easily.
2. All sections of the dashboard are accessible with minimal clicks.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the dashboard, when a user navigates through it, then they should be able to access all sections easily.

user_stories.title: Ensure portal works on desktops
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to work seamlessly on a desktop, so that I can access services on a larger screen.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Portal should adapt to various desktop screen resolutions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Portal displays properly on desktop screens.
2. All features are accessible on a desktop.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a desktop device, when I access the portal, then it should display and work properly.

user_stories.title: Ensure portal works on tablets
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to work seamlessly on a tablet, so that I can access services on a medium-sized screen.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Portal should adapt to various tablet screen sizes and resolutions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Portal displays properly on tablet screens.
2. All features are accessible on a tablet.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a tablet device, when I access the portal, then it should display and work properly.

user_stories.title: Ensure portal works on mobile phones
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the portal to work seamlessly on a mobile phone, so that I can access services on a small screen.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Portal should adapt to various mobile phone screen sizes and resolutions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Portal displays properly on mobile phone screens.
2. All features are accessible on a mobile phone.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a mobile device, when I access the portal, then it should display and work properly.

user_stories.title: Maintain data consistency with core banking system
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want the portal to maintain data consistency with the core banking system, so that user data is accurate.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Data updates should be real-time and synchronized with the core banking system.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Data is consistent between the portal and core banking system.
2. Updates are synchronized in real-time.
user_stories.test_cases: Given data updates, when changes occur, then data should be consistent and synchronized in real-time.

user_stories.title: Ensure real-time updates between portal and core banking
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want the portal to provide real-time updates with the core banking system, so that the system is always current.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integration should support real-time data updates between systems.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Data updates are reflected in real-time across systems.
2. Users experience minimal delays due to data synchronization.
user_stories.test_cases: Given data transactions, when updates are made, then they should be reflected in real-time across the systems.

user_stories.title: Optimize integration for performance
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want the integration with the core banking system to be optimized for performance, so that processes are efficient and reliable.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integration should be designed to handle high volumes of transactions efficiently.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Integration performs efficiently even with high volumes of transactions.
2. System reliability is maintained.
user_stories.test_cases: Given high transaction volumes, when integration is in use, then it should perform efficiently and reliably.
